page.title: 11CRICKET CLUB RE-OPND KLMRNCK
page.content: 1984 WAS A BLACK YEAR FOR KILMARNOCK CRICKET CLUB.ON AUGUST 11 IN THE EARLY HOURS OF THE MORNING VANDALS BROKE INTO THE CLUBHOUSE AND STARTED A FIRE IN THE CLUB LOUNGE.DESPITE THE SUBSEQUENT EFFORTS OF THE LOCAL FIRE BRIGADE THE BUILDING WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED. 53 WEEKS LATER ON THE 18TH AUGUST 1985 THE NEW CLUBHOUSE WAS OPENED BY TWO OF THE CLUBS LIFE MEMBERS IN THE PRESENCE OF OVER 200 MEMBERS AND GUESTS. THE REPLACEMENT CLUBHOUSE IS A MORE SUBSTANTIAL BUILDING THAN THE PREVIOUS ONE BEING BUILT TOTALLY IN BRICK AS OPPOSED TO THE MAINLY WOODEN CONSTRUCTION OF THE ORIGINAL. THE NEW BUILDING WAS DESIGNED SUCH THAT SOCIAL AND INDOOR FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE TO COMPLEMENT THE MAIN CRICKETING SIDE OF THE CLUB.CONTD.
